name: Lead Generation
description: Find and contact local businesses that need websites. Automated prospecting, enrichment, and outreach pipeline.
author: zinbot

region.label: Target Region
region.description: Geographic area to search for businesses

email_from.label: Sender Email
email_from.description: Email address to send outreach from

daily_limit.label: Daily Email Limit
daily_limit.description: Maximum emails to send per day

steps.name: Scout for Leads
steps.description: Search for businesses without websites in target region
steps.task: Search for {{config.categories}} businesses in {{config.region}} that have no website or a very outdated one. Find at least 10 new leads. Save to leads CSV with: name, phone, email, address, category. Verify each business actually lacks a proper website before adding.

steps.name: Enrich Contacts
steps.description: Verify emails and find phone numbers for new leads
steps.task: Review leads found today. For each: verify email exists (use Hunter.io or similar), find phone number, check Google Maps for reviews and opening hours. Update lead records with enriched data. Mark unverifiable leads.

steps.name: Draft Outreach
steps.description: Generate personalized email drafts for approved leads
steps.task: For leads marked as ready, draft personalized cold emails. Reference their specific business, location, and why a website would help them. Keep it short (3-4 sentences), friendly, and local. Save drafts for review. Max {{config.daily_limit}} per day.

steps.name: Send Outreach
steps.description: Send approved outreach emails (requires manual approval)
steps.task: Review drafted emails and send approved ones via {{config.email_from}}. Log all sent emails with timestamp and recipient. Never send without explicit approval.

steps.name: Track Responses
steps.description: Check for replies and update lead status
steps.task: Check inbox for replies to outreach emails. Categorize: interested, not interested, bounced. Update lead status. Flag hot leads (interested) for immediate follow-up notification.
